ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and that is a mighty oath if you only knew -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And this surely is great evidence if you can understand --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and this is indeed a mighty oath, if only you knew –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: - which is indeed a great oath if only you knew it -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that is indeed a tremendous oath, if you understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily that is indeed a great oath, if you but know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely it is a very great oath if you only knew;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (and that is indeed a mighty oath, did you but know it)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! that verily is a tremendous oath, if ye but knew -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, indeed, that is a most mighty oath, if you only knew --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily that is a mighty oath, if ye but knew!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And indeed it is a great oath, should you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that is indeed a mighty adjuration if ye but knew,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, that is indeed a great oath, if you but know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that is a mighty oath, if you but knew
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is an oath, if you only knew, that is tremendous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:76] And indeed it, the swearing by these [setting-places of stars], is a tremendous oath, if you only knew — if you were people of [deep] knowledge, you would realise the magnitude of this oath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! That) i.e. the Qur'an (verily is a tremendous oath, if ye but knew) if you but believe.
